pr_title: Prevent tridents from being picked up

timeline.message: Prevent tridents from being picked up

timeline.author: mdcfe

replies.bodyText:
In the middle of the 1.9 or 1.10 lifecycle
Tridents were added in 1.13 so we don't need a backport for 1.8
replies.author: JRoy

replies.bodyText: @md678685 Looking through various API revisions, it looks like this dates as far back as at least 1.9.4 (source).
replies.author: pop4959

replies.bodyText: Is there an equivalent for 1.8.8 to limit picking up arrows? If not, this isn't a blocker.
replies.author: mdcfe

replies.bodyText: I added 1.8.8 support, tested and works.
replies.author: JRoy
